## SeisFluidConnectionOptionalParams.useStore property

Create a  and expose it as the `store` property.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly useStore?: SeisFluidStoreOption;
```

## Remarks

When set to one of the available [options](./lib-ethers.ethersfluidstoreoption.md)<!-- -->, [ReadableSeisFluid.connect()](./lib-ethers.readableethersfluid.connect_1.md) will return a [ReadableSeisFluidWithStore](./lib-ethers.readableethersfluidwithstore.md)<!-- -->, while [SeisFluid.connect()](./lib-ethers.ethersfluid.connect_1.md) will return an [SeisFluidWithStore](./lib-ethers.ethersfluidwithstore.md)<!-- -->.

Note that the store won't start monitoring the blockchain until its  function is called.
